H0.text: Hamilcar Barca was the father of which famous general. Mago Barca

H1.text: Hamilcar Barca was the father of which famous general. Hasdrubal Barca

H2.text: Hamilcar Barca was the father of which famous general. Scipio Africanus

H3.text: Hamilcar Barca was the father of which famous general. Hanibal

A4.text: Hasdrubal Barca was the son of Hamilcar Barca.
